perspectives_reclaim.theme: Internal Transition: From Victimhood to Empowerment

the_narrative.original_state: Upon admission, the client presented as disheveled, disoriented, and deeply entrenched in a 'victim-based' identity. She conceptualized her former partner as an 'addiction' and her drinking as a 'byproduct of all the trauma,' describing a sense of being 'underwater' and 'trapped' by her past.
the_narrative.reclaimed_state: By the end of the clinical cycle, Megan moved toward a self-empowered stance. She began conceptualizing her recovery as an 'internal transition,' explicitly seeking to reclaim personal autonomy and a version of herself she remembers from before her marriageâ€”one who was competent and in control.

clinical_milestones.description: Transitioned from experiencing trauma as physical 'throat constriction' and 'shallow breathing' to actively using trauma-focused yoga and guided breathwork to 'vocalize' and release stored tension.
clinical_milestones.outcome: Improved interoceptive awareness and emotional regulation.

clinical_milestones.description: Moved from viewing herself as 'stuck' to viewing her anger toward her ex-partner as 'earned' and valid, allowing her to process fear without resorting to substance use for numbing.

Identified a personal, 'universal version' of spirituality (influenced by Thich Nhat Hanh), replacing feelings of isolation with a sense of being 'connected' to a higher power for the first time in years.

strengths_reclaimed: Resilience as a Parent and Pet Owner

patient_voice.key_quote_1: I want this trauma out... it's like I have a fishing hook in me and I just want to pull it out.
patient_voice.key_quote_2: I'm tired of carrying around all this other stuff. I want to be the whole human I want to be.
patient_voice.key_quote_3: I need a safe and supportive setting to engage in trauma therapy... I'm looking forward to being happy again.

reclamation_plan.focus: Addressing the 'bricks' of trauma through continued CPTSD workbook application.
reclamation_plan.objective: Establish an independent life free from the ex-partner's control, focusing on 'peace and calm' through mortgage refinancing and a stable recovery environment (SLE).
reclamation_plan.next_step: Step-down to Avery Lane or Honeycomb Wellness to bridge residential insights into real-world autonomy.
